text: Haron Amin (Dari: هارون امین; June 19, 1969Born 1969 as per Intelius profile; accessed February 15, 2015. – February 15, 2015) was the Afghan ambassador to Japan and non-resident ambassador to Thailand, the Philippines and Singapore from 2004 to 2009. Amin was born in Kabul, Afghanistan. Amin died of cancer at a U.S. hospital, aged 47. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Afghanistan Category:Cancer deaths in the United States Category:People from Kabul Category:21st-century Afghan people
title: Haron Amin
